Name: Wild world
About the game: As an engineer, you need to fend off waves of opponents who want to destroy the main generators that help you survive. In defense, not only agility and ability to run, but also firearms will help. Each weapon has its own characteristics. Some explode, setting fire to everything around them, some pierce the enemy through and through. Also use towers for defense. There are many enemies and they are merciless. You need to hold out for a certain amount of time and survive. Be brave and victory will not be long in coming! -Beautiful graphics -Dynamic gameplay -Many enemies
